LanguageData.ZP_Brazier.label: Brazier
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier.description: 【燃料:薪,藁,モミガライト,炭 最高気温:28℃ 容量:120】\n日本の伝統的な暖房器具。火鉢を囲んでみんなで団欒できる。
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier_Blueprint.label: Brazier (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier_Frame.label: Brazier (building)
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier_Frame.description: 【燃料:薪,藁,モミガライト,炭 最高気温:28℃ 容量:120】\n日本の伝統的な暖房器具。火鉢を囲んでみんなで団欒できる。
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu.label: Kotatsu
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu.description: The Kotatsu is a table with an electric heater underneath and a heavy blanket on top to trap the warmth. The table, like the Chabudai, is low to the floor, meaning that colonists must sit on the floor-or tatami/zabuton-to get their legs under the table.
